metadata.title: CVE-2013-4525 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability inmod/quiz/report/responses/responses_table.php in Moodle through 2.2.11,2.3.x before 2.3.10, 2.4.x before 2.4.7, and 2.5.x before 2.5.3 allowsremote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via ananswer to a text-based quiz question.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4525` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.3-1').
